data.title: Front End Developer, Partner
data.free_text: As a Front End Developer, I have the opportunity to contribute to the development of user-friendly interfaces, ensuring an exceptional digital experience for our customers.

data.title: Front End Developer, Vii Events
data.free_text: A multi-award-winning Metaverse events platform. My role was to work together with the backend team to provide an end-to-end working solution.

data.title: Junior Front End Developer, Vii Events
data.free_text: A multi-award-winning Metaverse events platform. The role required good knowledge and experience with web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), to build dynamic web-based apps.

data.title: QA, Vii Events
data.free_text: A multi-award-winning Metaverse events platform. I created test plans according to product requirements for mobile, web, and backend, and provided test results and product feedback to expedite and improve our delivery.
